name: Fintech to YNAB (JS)
description: Automatically push Monzo and Starling transactions into YNAB

URL_SECRET.description: This is a secret used for the webhooks endpoint

APPLY_MEMO.description: Apply this string to all imported transactions

AUTO_CLEAR.description: Whether to automatically clear imported transactions

MONZO_APPLY_FLAG.description: (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED) Colour flag applied to Monzo transactions

STARLING_APPLY_FLAG.description: (NOT YET IMPLEMENTED) Colour flag applied to Starling transactions
